title: The turbulent recent history of Ferrari's F1 team principals
summary: Amidst relentless pressure from fans, media, and Ferrari's own upper management, the Scuderia has cycled through a series of team principals in recent years, each facing intense scrutiny

qa_pairs.question: Which F1 team is known as Scuderia?
What role does a team principal play in an F1 team?
Which of the following factors contributes to the pressure on F1 team principals?
